title: Onboarding v0 flow (vibe, constraints, baseline, class, starter quest)
description: Implement onboarding v0: vibe selection, constraints, baseline inputs, class selection, and a starter quest. Keep time-to-first-win under 3 minutes.

title: Profile v0 (history + "what changed my score")
description: Implement Profile v0: history views (body score, measurements, training volume) and "what changed my score" breakdown.

title: Social v0 (feed + party + reactions + assists)
description: Implement Social v0: activity feed cards, party view with shared XP, reactions, and assist mechanic.

title: Define domain models + scoring rules (Level + Body Score)
description: Define core data models (user, workouts, measurements, avatar, social) and scoring rules for Level XP and Body Score. Include component weights and update cadence (daily/weekly/monthly).

title: App shell + design system (bottom nav + tokens)
description: Build the app shell and visual system: bottom nav (Today, Train, Avatar, Social, Profile), tokens, typography, spacing, and base layouts.

title: Seed content (starter programs + exercises)
description: Seed starter content: programs (3/4/5-day, minimal equipment) and initial exercise library.

title: Measurements + weekly check-in (weight/waist + recap card)
description: Implement measurements and weekly check-in flow: weight/waist input, recap card, and body score recalculation trigger.

title: Progression system v0 (XP, streaks, quests, rust/momentum)
description: Implement progression system v0: XP, streak multipliers, daily/weekly quests, and rust/momentum decay behavior.

title: Today screen v0 (next action card + start + readiness + party status)
description: Create Today screen v0 with next action card, persistent Start CTA, readiness/streak/level, party status, and a small Body Score trend widget.

title: Train: program view + workout player v0
description: Implement Train plan view and Workout Player v0: exercise tiles with last/target, demo loop, set logging, rest timer, RPE/pain, and quick swap if pain > 3.

title: Avatar v0 (stylized model + stats + body score + scan placeholder)
description: Implement Avatar v0: stylized model, Body Score badge, stats list, and scan placeholder with update cadence and confidence messaging.

title: Data persistence + sync scaffolding (local + API stub)
description: Set up data persistence and sync scaffolding: local storage, basic data layer, and API stubs for future server sync.

title: Privacy/safety controls (private mode + opt-in visibility)
description: Implement privacy and safety controls: private mode, hide body metrics, and opt-in visibility for photos/scores.
